The Challenge

Organizing hackathons shouldn't be a hackathon itself

Time-Consuming Setup

Hours spent on manual registration, team formation, and event logistics

Participant Disengagement

Poor team matching and lack of real-time support leads to frustrated participants

Administrative Overload

Juggling multiple tools and constant manual intervention throughout the event

Your AI Co-Pilot for Hackathons

Streamline every aspect of your hackathon with intelligent automation

AI-Powered Content Generation

Automatically generate event descriptions, challenges, and promotional materials tailored to your audience

Smart Team Matching

Intelligent algorithms pair participants based on skills, interests, and complementary expertise

24/7 Support Bot

Instant assistance for participants with questions about rules, resources, and technical issues
